//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "wonder01", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "01_01" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder01" );
	}


	task ( "01_02" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder02" );
	}


	task ( "01_03" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder03" );
	}


	task ( "01_04" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder04" );
	}


	task ( "01_05" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder05" );
	}


	task ( "01_06" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder06" );
	}


	loop ( -1 )
	{
		dowait ( "01_01" );
		set ( "SET_STANCE", "Crouch" );
		wait ( $random( 20000, 28000 )$ );
		set ( "SET_STANCE", "Stand" );
		dowait ( "01_02" );
		wait ( $random( 22000, 30000 )$ );
		dowait ( "01_03" );
		wait ( $random( 5000, 9000 )$ );
		dowait ( "01_04" );
		wait ( $random( 22000, 30000 )$ );
		dowait ( "01_05" );
		wait ( $random( 2000, 10000 )$ );
		dowait ( "01_06" );
		wait ( $random( 5000, 15000 )$ );
	}

}


affect ( "wonder02", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "02_01" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder01" );
	}


	task ( "02_02" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder02" );
	}


	task ( "02_03" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder03" );
	}


	task ( "02_04" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder04" );
	}


	task ( "02_05" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder05" );
	}


	task ( "02_06" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "wonder06" );
	}


	loop ( -1 )
	{
		dowait ( "02_01" );
		set ( "SET_STANCE", "Crouch" );
		wait ( $random( 20000, 28000 )$ );
		set ( "SET_STANCE", "Stand" );
		dowait ( "02_03" );
		wait ( $random( 5000, 9000 )$ );
		dowait ( "02_02" );
		wait ( $random( 22000, 30000 )$ );
		dowait ( "02_05" );
		wait ( $random( 2000, 10000 )$ );
		dowait ( "02_04" );
		wait ( $random( 22000, 30000 )$ );
		dowait ( "02_06" );
		wait ( $random( 5000, 15000 )$ );
	}
